name: Initialize Global Vars
Main Flow
info: This flow contains nodes that define the overall configuration and monitor state of the system.

name: CSS-style overrides
format:
<style>

    /* Don't let title expand */
    md-card md-card-title {
        flex: 0 0 auto !important;
    }

    /* Don't show scrollbars */
    .nr-dashboard-template {
        overflow-y: hidden !important;
    }
</style>
info:
CSS Style overrides to the Node-RED Dark theme.

From the Dashboard node information panel (View->Dashboard), select
 - Site: Options -> Node-RED theme everywhere
 - Theme: Style -> Dark
